title: Email Registration with One-Time Password
description: Verify user can register using an email address and system sends a one-time password (OTP) for first-time login. Confirm that the OTP is copied to clipboard after successful registration.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page
Input a valid email address and submit registration request
Verify system generates and sends OTP to the provided email
Verify registration success message is displayed
Verify OTP credentials are copied automatically to clipboard

title: Login Using Email and Password
description: Validate user can login using registered email and corresponding password, including password-less login and verification code login

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Select email and password login mode
Enter valid registered email and password
Click login button
Verify user is logged in successfully and redirected to tests page
Logout and select verification code login mode
Input registered email and request verification code
Input received verification code
Click login button
Verify user is logged in successfully without entering password

title: Login with Invalid Credentials
description: Ensure login fails appropriately when user inputs invalid email, incorrect password, or expired/incorrect verification code

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter invalid email format
Attempt login
Verify proper error message for invalid email format is displayed
Enter registered email but incorrect password
Attempt login
Verify password incorrect error message is displayed
Select verification code login and enter registered email
Input incorrect or expired verification code
Attempt login
Verify verification code invalid or expired error message is displayed

title: Complete Multi-dimensional Tests and Generate Basic Report
description: Verify logged-in user can complete personality traits, transaction traits, math & finance ability, and risk preference tests successfully and receive a personalized investment strategy report

steps.description: Login successfully
Navigate through all required test sections: Big Five personality, transaction traits, math & finance ability, risk preference
Complete test inputs and submit
Verify test data is saved and correctly associated with user account
Verify system generates a personalized investment strategy based on Euclidean distance algorithm
Verify basic investment strategy report is displayed to the user

title: Generate DeepSeek AI Analysis Report
description: Validate user with paid access can generate deep AI-based investment psychological analysis report in either Chinese or English and view the result correctly

steps.description: Login as user with paid access
Complete and submit required tests
Navigate to DeepSeek AI analysis feature
Trigger generation of AI-based psychological investment report
Verify the report is generated without errors
Switch language between Chinese and English
Verify report content updates accordingly while maintaining accuracy and completeness

title: Stripe Payment and Order Processing
description: Test payment flow via Stripe is handled correctly including checkout creation, payment verification, order record creation, and linkage to user test results

steps.description: Login as user requiring payment
Navigate to payment page and select Stripe payment option
Complete payment process with valid card and submit
Verify checkout session is created properly
Verify Stripe confirms successful payment
Verify order status is updated to 'paid'
Verify order is linked correctly to user's test records

title: Gift Code Redemption with Usage and Activation Controls
description: Verify that users can redeem gift codes with proper checks on usage limits, valid date ranges, and activation status affecting payment or feature unlock

steps.description: Login as normal user
Navigate to gift code redemption page
Enter a valid gift code with remaining usage and valid date
Submit redemption
Verify redemption is accepted and usage count decreased
Attempt redemption of gift code exceeding maximum usage
Verify error message for code usage limit reached
Attempt redemption of expired gift code
Verify error message for expired code
Attempt redemption of inactive gift code
Verify error message for inactive code

title: Administrator Role and Blacklist Management
description: Validate that system administrators can add/remove admin users, manage blacklist emails, and block blacklisted users from logging in

steps.description: Login as administrator
Add a new administrator account
Verify new administrator can login and access admin features
Add an email address to the blacklist
Verify blacklisted email is listed in blacklist management
Logout and attempt login with blacklisted email
Verify login is rejected and appropriate message displayed
Remove email from blacklist
Verify user with that email can login successfully again

title: System Internationalization and Date Localization
description: Ensure the system supports English and Chinese languages globally, including switching and that date formats localize correctly per language and region

steps.description: Login as user
Change interface language to English
Verify all UI text updates to English
Verify date formats shown throughout UI correspond to English locale
Change interface language to Chinese
Verify all UI text updates to Chinese
Verify date formats shown throughout UI correspond to Chinese locale

title: Test Data Storage and Retrieval Consistency
description: Verify that test results, payment information, gift code usage, and AI analysis data are consistently stored in local storage and backend, and retrieved correctly

steps.description: Login and complete tests
Verify test data is saved correctly in backend and local storage
Perform Stripe payment and verify order
Verify payment and order data saved properly
Redeem a valid gift code
Verify gift code usage state updated in storage and database
Generate DeepSeek AI analysis report
Verify AI analysis result cached in local storage and matches backend data

title: Navigation and Routing Correctness
description: Check that page navigation between login, test, results, history, comparison, and payment success pages works correctly and state is preserved

steps.description: Login user
Navigate sequentially through Test page, Result page, Test History page, Test Comparison page, and Payment Success page
Verify pages load without error and maintain correct user data and UI state
Test back and forward buttons of browser to verify routing
Verify routing is correct and no data is lost or corrupted

title: System Stability and Security Compliance
description: Perform stress tests and security checks ensuring stable system operation under load, secure transmission and storage of sensitive data (passwords, tokens), and compliance with security standards

steps.description: Simulate multiple concurrent user registrations and logins
Verify system performance remains stable without crashes
Attempt SQL injection and cross-site scripting attacks through input fields
Verify inputs are sanitized and attacks are prevented
Verify passwords are stored hashed and secure communication (HTTPS) is enforced
Verify no plaintext passwords or tokens are exposed
